text:
Advertisement

She has one of the most envy-inducing bodies in showbiz.

So it's no surprise Kendall Jenner, 22, ensured all eyes were well and truly on her frame when she stole the thunder at the Chopard party during the 71stCannes Film Festival on Friday.

Always wearing next-to-nothing on the red carpet, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star bared all when she went braless in the semi-sheer mini dress for her most titillating display to date.

Cannes Film Festival: Braless Kendall Jenner leaves NOTHING to the imagination in sheer sparkling mini dress as she leads the glamour at Chopard party

Despite previously revealing she thinks her nipple piercing is sexy, the catwalk queen could be seen without her nipple piercing in the very exposing dress.

While the stunner went without her nipple piercing, she did wear a huge rock on her left hand and dangling earrings to complete her look.

After she donned just thousands of twinkling diamonds on the Met Gala red carpet last year, it's hardly surprising Kendall has upped the style stakes for this year's Cannes.

And while she made a more demure appearance at New York City's Met Gala this year in a white jumpsuit, it seems the Kardashian was saving her raciest look for the 71st annual film festival.

Sheer delight! After she donned just thousands of twinkling diamonds on the Met Gala red carpet last year, it's hardly surprising Kendall has upped the style stakes for this year's Cannes

Incredible looks: And while she made a more demure appearance at New York City's Met Gala this year in a white jumpsuit, it seems the Kardashian was saving her raciest look for the 71st annual film festival

Exposed: Despite previously revealing she thinks her nipple piercing is sexy, the catwalk queen could be seen without her nipple piercing in the very exposing dress

The sexy number was completely made up of a sizzling sheer mesh which teased a glimpse of the Kardashian's naked body underneath.

Onlookers would be forgiven for thinking Kendall had gone absolutely naked underneath the dress but the reality star opted for a pair of scanty nude pants that were barely visible.

The second youngest of the Kardashian clan raised her hands above her head to ensure onlookers got a good glimpse at her naked body beneath the mesh.

Check her out: The second youngest of the Kardashian clan raised her hands above her head to ensure onlookers got a good glimpse at her naked body beneath the mesh

Move out the way Kim! Kendall worked every angle in her sexy mesh dress, keen to show off all angles of her incredibly toned physique and showcase her naked skin beneath the sheer number

Golden girl: While the stunner went without her nipple piercing, she did wear a huge rock on her left hand and dangling earrings to complete her look

Taking pride in her incredible physique, the model exuded confidence as she put on the very flirty display at the star-studded extravaganza.

Kim Kardashian's younger half-sister made her astonishing legs appear endless by pairing her thigh-grazing number with sky-scraper designer heels.

The statuesque model brought her arms above her head to toy with her mid-length raven tresses to ensure her looks were on point during the evening's festivities.

Very revealing: Kendall claimed her famous sisters, the Kardashian clan, were shocked that she had got a nipple piercing

The E! reality star set the bar high for the style stakes in Cannes as she commanded attention in her little number.

Hot on Kendall's heels were lingerie models Stella Maxwell, Irina Shayk and Joan Smalls who pulled off three very different looks at the star-studded bash.

The Victoria's Secret Angel looked devilishly sexy in her very revealing risqué dress, while Irina wowed in her thigh-split velvet number and Joan looked beyond beautiful in her white two-piece.

Cheeky: 'I think people are obsessed with the topic because it seems so unexpected of me,' she once said about the piercing

Sizzling siren: She continued on her website, 'I just like showing my nipples through some of my outfits. There's something understated, yet sexy about it.'

Thumbs up! Kendall was confident in her good looks as she flashed a thumbs up to the cameras on the red carpet

Grand entrance: The E! reality star set the bar high for the style stakes in Cannes as she commanded attention in her little number

Leading ladies: Stella Maxwell looked sensual in a VERY revealing dress as she joined forces with leggy Irina Shayk and sexy Joan Smalls at Chopard party, following Kendall Jenner

Narrowly avoiding a nip slip, the statuesque model clutched hold of the plunging neckline of her dress as she struggled to contain her ample cleavage in her skintight ensemble.

Stella's bust threatened to over spill the form-fitting lace bodice element of her dress, which also featured a beaded belt to accentuate her infinitely small waistline.

The incredibly racy ensemble also featured a semi-sheer skirt, which teased a glimpse of her envy-inducing spidery legs that were elongated thanks to her heels.

Bust-ing out! Stella's bust threatened to over spill the form-fitting lace bodice element of her dress, which also featured a beaded belt to accentuate her infinitely small waistline

Almost fashion faux pas! Narrowly avoiding a nip slip, the statuesque model clutched hold of the plunging neckline of her dress as she struggled to contain her ample cleavage in her skintight ensemble

Model arrival: Irina was up next — keen to steal Stella's thunder in her very own risqué number as she pulled off a seductive display in her thigh-split strapless gown

Sparkling: Irina's dazzling dress was lined with thousands of sequins which glimmered in the light and ensured attention was paid to her shapely thighs

She's bow-tiful! Joan donned a crop top in the style of a cute bow for the bash, which she teamed with a long elegant skirt

To add to her sex appeal, the tantalizing skirt featured a split which was slashed to her hip — leaving nothing to the imagination as she sauntered through the glamorous venue.

Irina was up next — keen to steal Stella's thunder in her very own risqué number as she pulled off a seductive display in her thigh-split strapless gown.

The Russian born beauty rested her hand on her thigh as she displayed her shapely legs in the dangerous slit in the dress which was cut to her inner thigh to show off as much leg as possible.

Steady on! Elsa Hosk nearly fell flat on her face as she tripped over her glamorous gown at the Chopard party during Cannes Film Festival at Chateau de la Croix des Gardes on Friday

Loving life: Not letting the mishap alarm her, she continued to pose up a storm and show off the gown as she headed into the bash

Leggy lady! The gown featured a stunning thigh high split that showcased her tanned and toned pins, which had been boosted by a pair of silver barely-there heels

Irina's dazzling dress was lined with thousands of sequins which glimmered in the light and ensured attention was paid to her shapely thighs.

Elsa Hosk nearly fell flat on her face as she tripped over her glamorous gown at the Chopard party during the 71st annual Cannes Film Festival at Chateau de la Croix des Gardes on Friday.

Clad in a billowing yellow gown, the 29-year-old model was playing around with the billowing cape detailing when she accidentally tangled her heel in the swathes of fabric.

Pins on parade: Izabel Goulart showcased her long slender legs in her thigh-grazing silver mini dress, adorned with lots of sequins for the ultimate glamour, and hoisted in at the waist to draw attention to her figure

Beautiful in black: Marion Cotillard flaunted her underwear in the dangerously plunging black ball gown which flattered her sensational figure on the red carpet

Different looks: Joan, Sui He, Josephine Skriver and Dorra Zarrouk looked sensational as they pulled off very different yet equally glamorous outfits for the extravaganza

What a dress! Ming Xi wowed in her thigh-split dress that featured a long train of fabric to capture the eyes and attention of all the party-goers at the Chopard bash

Not letting the mishap alarm her, she continued to pose up a storm and show off the gown as she headed into the bash.

It was no wonder the Swedish stunner was keen to show off her gown as it was a beautiful lemon yellow satin and chiffon gown adorned with intricate jewels.

The gown featured a stunning thigh high split that showcased her tanned and toned pins, which had been boosted by a pair of silver barely-there heels.

Elsa finished off the look by styling her glossy golden locks into a half up style, that showed off the dazzling diamond earrings she wore.

Social butterflies! Robert Konjic and Catrinel Menghia partied hopped from the Ash Is The Purest White premiere earlier on in the evening as they made the most of their stay in Cannes for the Film Festival

Legs first: Sara Sampaio put her long spidery legs on display in the soaring split which was slashed to her inner thigh and as a result, showed off as much of her fabulous figure as possible

Twirl it: Lupita Nyong'o span around in her salmon pale pink ball gown, the extravagant skirt looked phenomenal as the star span around on the carpet

Vibrant: Lupita brought a splash of bright colour to the attire as she stood out in her colourful pink ball gown

Elegant: Julianne Moore, 57, cut an elegant figure in a black tuxedo with diamond detailing and a matching necklace

Glamorous: The actress styled her fiery red locks into a sophisticated and sleek hairdo, adding smoky eye shadow, blusher and pink lipstick to her entire ensemble

Elsewhere, while she went without her nipple piercing at Cannes, Kendall previously discussed how she thought the item of jewellery was 'understated yet sexy'.

'I think people are obsessed with the topic because it seems so unexpected of me,' she once said about the piercing. 'My sisters were honestly shocked that I did it.'

She continued on her website: 'I just like showing my nipples through some of my outfits. There's something understated, yet sexy about it.'

Kendall's youngest sister Kylie also got her nipple pierced and has shown it off on a number of occasions.

Stylish duo: Josephine and Kendall knew how to work their best angles as they posed up a storm at the star-studded A-list event

Talented: Enrique Iglesias, 43, showed off his singing talent and performed to a huge audience at the glamorous Chopard party on Friday night
title: Cannes Film Festival: Kendall Jenner goes braless at Chopard party
